def_cn: (因担忧、恐惧、厌恶或寒冷)发抖，打颤，战栗
def_en: If you shudder, you shake with fear, horror, or disgust, or because you are cold.

def_cn: (机器、交通工具等)强烈震动，剧烈抖动
def_en: If something such as a machine or vehicle shudders, it shakes suddenly and violently.
If something sends a shudder or shudders through a group of people, it makes them worried or afraid.

def_cn: 不敢设想;想到…不寒而栗
def_en: If you say that you shudder to think what would happen in a particular situation, you mean that you expect it to be so bad that you do not really want to think about it.
